name: Flash Furniture Hercules Series 32" Slat Back Metal Bar Stool in Black

reviews.name: Metal Cut Out Bar Stool 32", Black and Natural
reviews.reviewText:
The height of the stools were perfect, since I have a counter that 42 in. high, I was having a hard time finding the recommended height, these are perfect.
I just wish they would have come in more colors.
They are really sturdy and I don't have to worry that they will tip over, there is no way of that happening.
The best part was the sale price, there was no way I could beat it any where.
Very happy. No assmbly required , just put the seats on, very easy.
reviews.title: Almost what I was looking for.

reviews.name: Metal Cut Out Bar Stool 32", Black and Natural
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for months for good quality reasonably priced bar stool. I was happly suprised when i found these for this price. I was even happier when I brought them home and set them up. Great Product!!!!
reviews.title: Great Product and an extremely good price

reviews.name: Metal Cut Out Bar Stool 32", Black and Natural
reviews.reviewText:
Came assembled except for screwing seat on. Seems well built, and stout enough for big and
heavy people. 32" is to the top of seat cushion.
reviews.title: 10 January 2013

reviews.name: Metal Cut Out Bar Stool 32", Black and Natural
reviews.reviewText: I ordered 3 of these bar stools. The quality is excellent. I am very pleased with the price and the product. They were easy to assemble and were ready to use in minutes.
reviews.title: Great barstool for a great price.

reviews.name: Metal Cut Out Bar Stool 32", Black and Natural
reviews.reviewText: These bar stools exceeded my expectations. I figured they'd be wobbly or flimsy but they're good sturdy stools. The wood grain back works well with my hardwood floor. Had to return one stool for a manafacturing defect, the replacement stool arrived and was perfect. Go ahead and buy these you won't be disappointed.
reviews.title: Great bar stools. Don't let the price fool you.
